scripts.dev: docker network create memrok-dev 2>/dev/null || true && docker compose --env-file .env -f deployment/traefik/docker-compose.yml -f deployment/traefik/docker-compose.dev.yml -f deployment/authelia/docker-compose.yml up -d && nuxt dev --host
scripts.dev:mini: docker compose --env-file .env -f deployment/authelia/docker-compose.yml up -d && nuxt dev --host
scripts.stop: docker compose --env-file .env -f deployment/traefik/docker-compose.yml -f deployment/traefik/docker-compose.dev.yml -f deployment/authelia/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.restart: bun run stop && bun run dev
scripts.restart:mini: bun run stop:mini && bun run dev:mini
